summary:
Work/Job experience
1985 – 1987: Several jobs in the Windsurf industrie in Friesland
1987 – 1999: (Electrical) engineer in several Yacht service- and Yacht building companies such as ‘Feadship’ (superyachts) in Workum and Makkum (NL)

2000 – 2016: ROC Friese Poort in Sneek, department Maritime Technology
Position: Teacher secondary vocational education / Internship- and Exam coordinator / Member of Examination Committee / Controller / Subject matter developer / Company emergency officer
Teaching in all technical departments (Electrical, Mechanical, Maritime and Water- sports industry)

Kitesurf instructor / Kitesurfschool-owner experience NETHERLANDS
2004 - 2007: active as certified kitesurf instructor at several ‘Royal Dutch Watersport Association’ and ‘VDWS international’ certified kitesurf schools
Since 2007 owner of www.NorthWestKiteboarding.com, a VDWS international / Royal Dutch Watersport Association certified kitesurf school with 2 locations in the Netherlands in Makkum (Friesland) IJsselmeer, head office and in Julianadorp at the Dutch Northsea coast. Kite- n Wing courses.

INTERNATIONAL Kitesurf instructor experience
2003-2013 Several international Kitesurf Trips in Europe
2014 - 2017: yearly event-trips to VDWS partner centre ‘Kite-Village’ Hamata, Red Sea Egypt – kite lessons, (spot)guiding n several clinics / coaching of all levels
Okt.2015: North Kiteboarding international dealer meeting, Le Morne Mauritius
Okt.2016 – Apr.2017: Centre manager / kitesurf instructor at ‘Mangroovy Kite’
El Gouna and Kite-Village Hamata
Dec.2017 – Apr.2018: Centre manager / kitesurf- and hydro foiling instructor at ‘The Reef Kite + Surf’ St. Lucia, Caribbean
Dec.2018 - Mrch.2019: Kitesurf- and hydrofoil instructor at ‘Quest Kiteboarding’, Diani Beach Kenya
Nov.2019 – Mrch.2021: Centre manager / kitesurf- and hydro foiling instructor at ‘Surf Shack - Coconut Bay Resort’ St. Lucia, Caribbean
Since Jan.2021 member of the VDWS international trainer team div. Kite/Foil/Wing
Dec.2021 – Mrch.2022: Kitesurf-, Kite Foil and Wing Foil instructor at ‘Jeremie Tronet JT Pro Center’ Union Island Grenadines, Caribbean

Languages
Dutch / Netherlands (native speaker)
German (native speaker)
English (good)

General skills and qualities
European Driving license B-E
ICC boat license Level 1+2 (ICC for inland and coastal waters)
40 years of experience in composite repairs of windsurf-, kitesurf- Wing- and SUP Boards, boats and carbon cycle frames 
1979-2002 perfervid Windsurfer (Wave- n Freestyle) / instructor

Conscientious, dedicated, accurate, reliable, flexible and balanced

treasury_media.title: NORTHWEST KITEBOARDING
treasury_media.description: NorthWest Kiteboarding is een kiteschool gevestigd in het NoordWesten van Nederland. Kitesurfen makkum en petten

education.field_of_study: Electrical, Electronic and Communications Engineering Technology/Technician

profile_positions.description:
NL
NorthWest-Kiteboarding…gevestigd in het NoordWesten van Nederland en Europa. De windrichting NW is favoriet op onze home-spots Makkum / Kornwerderzand aan de Friese IJsselmeerkust en Petten / Camperduin aan de noordzee. Door het ondiepe water op het IJsselmeer en de golven op de noordzee zijn dit een van de beste en rustigste kite(les)locaties van Nederland, zo niet van Europa. Of je nou beginner bent of expert.

Wij zijn een door de VDWS-international en Watersportverbond (KNWV) erkende kitesurfschool en hebben meer dan 10 jaar ervaring in Kitesurfing en die daarbij behorende leer-concepten.
Onze goed opgeleide-gediplomeerde Kitesurfinstructeurs verzorgen (bij temp. boven 10 graden) het gehele jaar door kitesurflessen aan particulieren en bedrijven waarbij persoonlijke begeleiding voorop staat. Tevens zijn wij test- en verhuurcenter voor North-Kiteboarding en kunt u bij ons terecht voor vakbekwame reparatie's van Kites, Kite- windsurf- en SUP-boards.
Dus we zien je graag @ www.NorthWestKiteboarding.com om deze fascinerende sport te leren of te beoefenen.

ENG
NorthWest-Kiteboarding...situated in the NorthWest of Holland and Europe. The NorthWesterly winds are our favourites at our homespots Makkum / Kornwerderzand off the Frisian IJsselmeer-coast with its typically shallow waters and Petten / Camperduin directly on the Northsea coast with some nice northsea swell both spots for all kind of kitecourses.

We have been a VDWS-international and Royal Dutch Watersportassociation approved Kitesurfschool with proven Kiteboarding and learning concepts for more than 10 years.
Our highly-qualified kitesurf-instructors will guide you during the whole season teaching Kiteboarding. Our highest priority is personal assistance from private instruction up to complete group arrangements. Including rentals and repairs of kites and (SUP)boards you’re on the right spot.
So CU @ www.NorthWestKiteboarding.com to learn or practice our fascinating Kitesurfing sport.
